meanings.definition: A dish made with beaten eggs and various ingredients, cooked in a skillet.
meanings.sent1: For breakfast, I enjoyed a delicious frittata with cheese and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: She cooked a frittata for brunch on Sunday.
meanings.sent3: The frittata was so fluffy, it almost looked like a colorful pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in making a frittata was like painting a masterpiece with eggs.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling frittata filled the kitchen with warmth and comfort.

meanings.sent1: I will frittata the eggs and veggies for our meal.
meanings.sent2: He frittatas a delicious dish every weekend.
meanings.sent3: She frittataed the ingredients together with a sprinkle of magic.
meanings.sent4: Frittataing the mixture slowly ensures a perfect texture.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully frittataed the ingredients into a mouthwatering creation.
